title: CAPs-Based Instructional Workshop for Pre-Service Mathematics Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mathematics education theory and classroom management experience
context.additional_context: VR simulation replicating real classroom scenarios, enabling repeated CAPs content listening via personal mobile devices.

learning_goals: Preservice teachers can design instructional strategies using CAPs to enhance math concept comprehension by 20%+ for students with special needs.
Learners can apply CAPs-acquired knowledge in VR simulations to execute 3+ differentiated math teaching methods.
Participants can suggest 2+ ways to improve student engagement in their CAPs-based lessons through peer assessment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
